pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Environment for Tree Exploration (ETE) is a Python programmingtoolkit that assists in the recontruction, manipulation, analysis andvisualization of phylogenetic trees (although clustering trees or anyother tree-like data structure are also supported).ETE is currently developed as a tool for researchers working inphylogenetics and genomics. If you use ETE for a published work,please cite::: Jaime Huerta-Cepas, Fran√ßois Serra and Peer Bork. "ETE 3: Reconstruction, analysis and visualization of phylogenomic data." Mol Biol Evol (2016) doi: 10.1093/molbev/msw046Visit http://etetoolkit.org for more info.
